name: mediaelement.js
description: Our personal favorite. Sports the right balance between mighty API and simple usage. Very clever Flash fallback with unified API. Currently supports MP4, MP3, HLS, M(PEG)-DASH, Soundcloud, Facebook, Twitch, Dailymotion, YouTube, Vimeo and FLV. More features (Chromecast, Quality Chooser, Playlist, Google Analytics, etc.) available at https://github.com/mediaelement/mediaelement-plugins
